actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to place certain conditions on the operation of Federal Advisory Committees for national park system units.

summary.text: Waives certain provisions of the Federal Advisory Committee Act with respect to Federal advisory bodies established for national park system units. Provides that any member of such a body may serve after the expiration of his or her term until a successor is appointed.

titles.title: A bill to place certain conditions on the operation of Federal Advisory Committees for national park system units.
